Text: East Power UBS StartUp Project Coordination Meeting Cc PST We are ready to bring the East Power UBSStartUp group back together again to accomplish the following objectives review the StartUp Gantt Chart taking us from UBS Launch date approx through days assign resources to the Gantt chart discuss common drive to store all startup information discuss interaction with west power and gas projects review final actions

RE Transmission Agreements Meeting Tues Jan am Cc PST Jim Christi Are you available to attend this meeting today to discuss the going forward plan for transmission agreements in UBS Debra Debra Bailey East Power Trading Original Message From Baughman Jr Don Sent Monday January PM To Rust Bill Bentley Corry Bailey Debra Donovan Terry W Abler Bill Rorschach Reagan Cc Will Lloyd Subject Transmission Agreements Meeting Tues Jan am Hey After speaking with Reagan in origination we thought it would be a good idea to evaluate the status of New Transmission Agreements project If it pleases all lets all get together from to on Tuesday Jan If you have any questions or timing conflicts give me a shout Don Baughman Wk Cell

TP ListPST Enclosed is the copy of the TP list with the updated fields we would like to have completed Lets meet today around if possible to fill in the commercial leads It is also located at MEprojectsUBSStartUpPwrImplPlan Debra

WHSRetail Systems Integration Analysis would like to discuss with you Cc Louise Lloyd and I believe there are significant cost savings and efficiencies to be gained in the following recommendations We would like to present our final results Monday and would like to talk with you if possible prior to the meeting With project Spark Gap we have identified and are managing our top systems gaps and priorities for the next year We are setting up SAP codes for these efforts in order to more closely monitor IT progress and spending We have coordinated and are combining our systems requirements with the West and Canada desks in order to present a global power strategic systems vision The following WHSRetail Systems Analysis effort has made it clear that we should integrate our wholesale and retail trading systems however we believe organizational changes will be required in IT and Trading Support to achieve the benefits and savings Please let us know if we can spend a few minutes with you prior to Mondays meeting Debra Debra Bailey East Power Desk wk cell Original Message From Bailey Debra Sent Friday November PM To Fink Mike Rao Ramesh Frazier Michael Gorny Vladimir Misra Narsimha Jenkins Beth Kumar Madhup Avs Mallik Day Smith L Albrecht Kristin Woulfe Greg Richter Jeff Allen Thresa A ONeil Murray P Nat Steve Herndon Rogers Rodriquez Andy Bentley Corry White Stacey W Allen Thresa A Simpson Stephen Cc Hall Bob M Kelly Fred Presto Kevin M Busby Todd Will Lloyd Belden Tim Dayao Anthony Perlman Beth Pickering Mark Stock Stephen Apollo Beth Reeves Leslie Pagan Ozzie Hotte Steve Subject WHSRetail Systems Integration Analysis ResultsRecommendations Under the direction of Tim Belden Kevin Presto Lloyd Will Anthony Dayao and Beth Perlman Todd Busby and I have completed the week analysis of wholesale and retail power systems integration Enclosed are the preliminary executive summary presentation and the detailed informationprocess flow diagrams In summary we identified at a high level commonality and critical dependencies across all main trading functions within retail and wholesale In order to ensure successful integration of systems and processes the team has identified the following recommendations Consider aligning the wholesale and retail support organizations with the Gas and Power Trading Manage business systems requirements for power globally with a program management team sponsored by the business owners Consider program managers responsible for the following three areas Trading Top priority to provide wholesale and retail positions and booking of shaped deals BillingSettlements Volume Management Top priority to provide retail solutions and develop global strategic systems gas power Risk Top priority to provide retail valuation and liquidation We will schedule a meeting next week to review the results of our analysis I look forward to receiving your inputs Thank you for your support on this effort Debra Debra Bailey East Power Desk wk cell

WHSRetail Systems Integration Analysis ResultsRecommendations Cc When Monday November AM AM GMT Central Time US Canada Where ECN Background Meeting Objective Under the direction of Tim Belden Kevin Presto Lloyd Will Anthony Dayao and Beth Perlman Todd Busby and I have completed the week analysis of wholesale and retail power systems integration We would like to present the results of our analysis and discuss recommendations the team believes will lead to cost savings and process efficiencies The analysis results are enclosed Agenda Background Summary of Results Integrated Systems Vision Open Issues Recommendations

Room change and revised agenda Trading Systems Workshop August th Cc The trading systems workshop will be held in Room C from to tomorrow August th Please note the room change Below is a revised agenda Opening remarks Kevin PrestoLloyd Will East Power project team roles and responsibilities Debra Bailey Networks team and capability Steve Nat EES team and capability Anthony Dayao Regulatory status across the North East Mid West South East and Ercot markets Andy RodriguezLloyd Will Discussion determine first market for project to focus on North East Mid West South East or Ercot initial indications are that PJM is the preferred market area All Review systems gaps identified by business owner Risk Stacey White Settlement and Volume Management Thresa Allen Scheduling and Trading Corry Bentley Final remarksWrapup Lloyd Will Lunch will be provided See you tomorrow Debra Original Message From Lloyd Will Sent Thursday August PM To Casey Evans Thresa A Allen Debra Bailey Steve Nat Mani Vadari Email Phil Crosby Email Corry Bentley Madhup Kumar Rebecca M Grace Dave Nommensen David Poston Andy Rodriquez Cc Tom May Kayne Coulter Leslie Reeves Kevin M Presto Christi L Nicolay Louise Kitchen Beth Perlman Tamara Jae Black Claudia Guerra Anthony Dayao Sally Beck Bob M Hall Subject Trading Systems Workshop We will be holding a trading systems workshop on Wednesday August th from to in meeting room C The following areas will be reviewed with the objective to create a common vision on what the project team will be accomplishing in the next months Note this is an informational meeting only and will be followed with decisionalscoping meetings in the following weeks General Areas that will be reviewed Introductions Opening remarks Kevin PrestoLloyd Will Review East Power project team roles and responsibilities Debra BaileyLloyd Will Review Networks team and capability Steve Nat Review Regulatory status across the North East Mid West South East and Ercot markets Andy RodriguezLloyd Will Discuss the market that we will be worked on first North East Mid West South East or Ercot Initial indications are that PJM is the preferred market area All Review risk system gaps identified by business owner Casey Evans Review settlement and volume management system gaps identified by business owner Thresa Allen Review scheduling trading system gaps identified by business owner Corry Bentley Review next steps and project schedule Debra Bailey Lunch will be arranged Claudia Guerra Please send any special diet requests to Claudia Please notify me of any additional items or changes we will need for this meeting Please invite additional additional staff that will assist with this business owners informational meeting Attached is an initial org chart and mission statement for your review and refinement Please indicate if you require a copy of the accenture report to prepare for this workshop Thanks File EastPowerSystemppt

Minutes Actions from todays UBS Start Up coordination meeting Cc PST Enclosed are the minutes from todays coordination meeting I have also enclosed the first rev of our project plan Please let me know if you have questions regarding todays meeting Thank you Debra East Power

Minutes and actions from todays UBS start up meetingPST Thank you for attending todays meeting I believe it went well Enclosed are the minutes and actions I will schedule a second meeting on Thursday to review where we are All meeting agendas minutesactions and the latest transmission provider list will be stored in the following directory on the M drive Please let me know if you need access to the M drive Debra MEprojectsUBSStartUp

EESWHS Systems Integration Team StatusDirective from IT Offsite Mtg Cc During the IT Offsite held on we formed a team of IT and business leads to develop high level information flows within and between EES and WHS The team was directed to identify business areas that would benefit from the integration and potential sharing of systems Todd Busby and I are leading this effort In summary our week project plan includes developing a baseline process and information flow diagram across EES and WHS for Jan recommendations to be implemented by June and our business vision for one integrated EESWHS system solution by June Beth Perlman provided Accenture on to assist in the facilitation and analysis of the data gathered Todd and I began the project on Monday and we will complete our initial analysis on Friday week effort Last week we completed a project scope schedule and initial high level information flow diagram which I have enclosed below In summary we are holding approx workshops a week with the business leads in the integration team On Wednesday we will spend the day with EESWHS IT to complete systems overlays on our business process and information flows I have sent invites for the meetings listed in the schedule below and look forward to working with you and your employees in the workshops Please call me with questions and comments regarding our plan and deliverables Thank you for your support on this effort Debra Debra Bailey East Power Desk o c

Business information needed for TP ISO and NERC agreements Cc Leslie Jim We will need the following information to complete the transmission provider applications ISO agreements and NERC memberships Billing Contact including address number email etc Customer Contact including address number email etc We recommend Corry Bentley for the East however need to confirm address Routing numbers billing fax numbers UBS AG DUNS number Confirm what company name to be utilized for the Transmission Provider ISO and NERC Regional Reliability Council agreementsmemberships Leslie can you assist in helping us finalize the above information We would like to begin mailing in the TP ISO NERC agreements next week on the th In regards to NERC ETAG and NERC business entity we would like to register as UBS If we register as UBSWE it may get confused with the East and West scheduling desks Therefore we would like to use the following initials for the NERC scheduling desk codes UBSE east desk UBSW west desk UBSC canada I will coordinate this with the West and Canada desks this week in addition to other remaining steps such as registration with Tradewave for JTSIN OASIS etc Debra Original Message From Forster David Sent Friday February PM To Bailey Debra Will Lloyd Subject FW UBS Names Summary Original Message From Forster David Sent Wednesday January AM To Guadarrama Michael DLEOL eCommerce Support Becker Lorraine Mandola Teresa Mcquade Jennifer Carter Carl Diamond Daniel Jafry Rahil Shults Bob Cc Webb Jay Subject UBS Names Summary Following is the summary of names at least as things stand as of this minute UBS Names Summary The contracting entity for US Gas and Power Master Agreements GTCs ETAs and PAs will be UBS AG The entity for US Gas and Power deals as appears on Product Descriptions will be UBS AG London Branch The company name for most promotional purposes eg marketing brochures will be UBS Warburg Energy though the full legal version of this name is UBS Warburg Energy LLC Where the keys logo is used format shall be keys UBS Warburg References to other names such as UBS Warburg Energy shall be in a separate part of the screenpage The website address will be wwwubswenergycom Questions still outstanding hopefully will be resolved early next week The name of the contracting entity for Canadian GTC Master ETA PA The name of the entity for Canadian Gas and Power Deals Conversion Map for Website Contents Based on the above Names Summary the following map should apply If you see any specific instances in which applying this map would result in a questionable result please see me and I will try to clarify the appropriate treatment Enron Corp UBS AG Enron North America UBS AG on Masters GTCs ETA PA ONLY Enron North America UBS AG London Branch on Product Descriptions EnronOnline UBSWenergy wwwenrononlinecom wwwubswenergycom Enron UBS

Canceled East Trading Desk Requirements Review Project Spark GAP Cc PST The latest requirements are below Please let me know if you can not attend today Please bring a copy of the requirements sheet with you today Thank you Debra Objective Review all East Desk tactical systems requirements and receive status on development progress This will be a high level review meeting Requirements needing detailed discussions will be identified and scheduled for individual scoping design meetings Agenda Note our first meeting may go over hour Volume Mngt and Settlements min Requirements Thresa Allen business lead Status David Poston IT support Scheduling and Trading min Requirements Corry Bentley business lead Status Duong Luu Will Smith IT support Fundamentals Genco Services min Requirements Lloyd Will business lead Status Madhup Kumar IT support Risk Management min Requirements Stacey White business lead Status Dave Nommensen Duong Luu Please let me know if you have any questions or suggestions Thank you Debra

Review EES Risk Mngt processes and Sytems Overlay EESWHS Integration Team Cc PST Kristin Enclosed is our overall schedule for the week documentation effort You are welcome to attend any meeting in the schedule you have time for We should finish our documentation of your processes during this meeting however Thanks for your help on this effort Debra

Canceled EES Risk Process review for EESWHS Integration Team Cc PST Kristin We needed to reschedule this meeting with you for next week I believe we will make better use of our time with you if we are more prepared going into the meeting I will contact you next week to schedule time Thank you for your support Debra I updated the room to See you there Debra This is a follow up from todays meeting since we ran out of time to discuss EES Risk Thank you for your help on this effort Debra

Updated Risk Management EES and Wholesale Processes Cc PST All If you do not have time for lunch please join us up on the trading desk at to grab Tree Beards We can take a min break from the meeting Debra Note We moved to room since it has a white board that can be copied Thank you Debra This meeting is a result of our EES Wholesale Systems integration meeting last week Friday Enclosed is our plan drafted by Accenture for the week The goal is to document all EES and Wholesale processes this week Thanks for your support Debra
Updated Volume Mngt Working Group PJM Scoping Cc PST Objective To finish up work not completed during Mondays meeting Debra

Business review of endtoend ERCOT deal flow Cc PST All We had a business review of the ERCOT Volume Management processes this morning and decided we should tag up with scheduling and trading prior to or review with ESCA on Wednesday The objective of this meeting on Tuesday is to review a systems drawing provided to us from ESCA We can make additionsmodifications to the drawing to review with ESCA during our Wednesday meeting I will send out the systems drawing by COB today Please let me know if you have any questionscomments or you would like to add others to the meeting Thank you Debra

ESCA Project Status ERCOT Cc PST Valentine and Jayant We can telecon you in Thresa Allen and I would like to hold a weekly meeting to discuss ERCOT activities as a group For our first meeting we would like ESCA to provide a review and status of the system development efforts thus far In addition we would like to cover the systems plan for volume mngt and settlements On a weekly basis we will only meet for min to an hour to cover status of our progress for the week Ill send out a separate meeting notice for the weekly meeting Please let me know if you have any questions or suggestions Thank you Debra X

Other Commodities into Consolidated Position Manager Scoping Meeting Cc PST Meeting Objective We will scope new requirements for position manager to provide functionality for other commodities gas coal In addition we will discuss the potential combining of CPM and Curve Manager functionalities Please let me know if you have further questions Thank you Debra X

Review Tactical RequirementsPST Stacey I updated your list with inputs from Casey and Donny I am ready to have you review the list with me I have enclosed the latest copy The requirements I would like to review with you are on Sheet of the Excel Spreadsheet Thank you Debra
Updated Volume Mngt Working Group continue Ercot discussion Cc PST David Poston will be in town Objective First meeting to review PJM Volume Mngt processes and procedures Debra

Updated Volume Mngt Working Group st Mtg Cc PST We will start minutes late Sorry for the late notice Debra We will Telcon in David Poston from Portland Objective To review Volume Mngt processes for ERCOT and receive status on ESCA volume mngt solution Please let me know if others need to attend otherwise I would like to keep the meeting small Debra

Weekly SparkGap TagupPST I would like us to meet as a group weekly to review project status and business requirements I will provide a detailed agenda on Wednesdays This week only we will meet today at Thanks Debra

Accenture ERCOT Business Model and Systems Solution WorkshopPST The objective of this meeting is to share the design and lessons learned in the ERCOT systems solution Emphasis will be placed on the Loadestar implementation In addition the secondary objective will be to share with EES IT the end to end process to implement an EES deal in the ERCOT market Preliminary agenda is enclosed Lunch will be provided Debra

Spark Gap Business Lead Weekly MeetingPST Objective East Desk weekly meeting to coordinate requirements among Project Spark Gap business leads review action items and project status Usually meeting will only be minutes from to Today we will go longer due to project startup Agenda Review Spark Gap Project Implementation Plan BaileyWill min Review Work Breakdown Structure Bailey min Review Spark Gap Requirements List Business Leads min Assign Preliminary Working Groups to develop Requirements All min Review EES Systems Drawing and Schedule Busby min Next StepsWrapup Bailey min

Retail Volume Management Software Cc PST Accenture completed the retail volume management software for Ercot just prior to Christmas Matt McDonald has set up a demonstration of the software with Accenture today from to room TBD Please join us in the demo if you are interested Matt will send out a room update Debra

EESWHS Systems Integration Team StatusDirective from IT Offsite Mtg Cc During the IT Offsite held on we formed a team of IT and business leads to develop high level information flows within and between EES and WHS The team was directed to identify business areas that would benefit from the integration and potential sharing of systems Todd Busby and I are leading this effort In summary our week project plan includes developing a baseline process and information flow diagram across EES and WHS for Jan recommendations to be implemented by June and our business vision for one integrated EESWHS system solution by June Beth Perlman provided Accenture on to assist in the facilitation and analysis of the data gathered Todd and I began the project on Monday and we will complete our initial analysis on Friday week effort Last week we completed a project scope schedule and initial high level information flow diagram which I have enclosed below In summary we are holding approx workshops a week with the business leads in the integration team On Wednesday we will spend the day with EESWHS IT to complete systems overlays on our business process and information flows I have sent invites for the meetings listed in the schedule below and look forward to working with you and your employees in the workshops Please call me with questions and comments regarding our plan and deliverables Thank you for your support on this effort Debra Debra Bailey East Power Desk o c
